com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPMenuView

java.lang.Object
  LinearLayout
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPMenuView
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class WPMenuView
extends LinearLayout

Used to simulate the effect of the "AppBar," the bottom row of clickable icons as well as a context-menu like list of clickable items. Everything automatically adapts to the current orientation, including the alignment of icons and text. It handles touch input in a rather advanced way, initially revealing only the icons but then displaying the captions and addition menu when slide up or if the ellipsis is clicked. It also automatically updates its colors based on whether the WPTheme is dark/ light.
A good deal is based off of Android's SlidingDrawer widget, mostly that which is associated with touch handling.

Since:
01-08-2012
